Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (int left = n - 2; left >= start; left--) {  	for (int right = left + 1; right < n; right++) {  		if (digits [left] != digits [right]) {  			Swap (ref digits [left]' ref digits [right]);  			Permute (digits' left + 1' n);  		}  	}  	var firstElement = digits [left];  	for (int i = left; i < n - 1; i++) {  		digits [i] = digits [i + 1];  	}  	digits [n - 1] = firstElement;  }
